channel.title: I need help with me server
channel.description:
hi i used demonscape as my source and i found how to change my combat skills but i want to know how to
1.get working commands 2.get working dummy room for xp. 3.get no lag because my server cant handle more than 10 people. 4.and i would also like to know how to get my teleport spells working 5.i want to know how to get a pk island 6.i want to know how to get out of varrock be cause when i try to get out of varrock it says its a forbidden zone.
please i need help thanks
project rockindragonscape 5% done.
thing i still need to add.
training commands fishing castle wars differnt starting place add santa,fairy and other npc's for shop's add kbd,qween kalphite(i forgot how you spell it)and jad. also i need working spells.

item.title: I need help with me server
item.dc:creator: @nooblet01 nooblet01
item.description:
@nooblet01 wrote:

dont even bother attempting to run one…odds are you wont change much of anything thats already in there and itll end up being just another server…also if it lags at like 10 people it will end up doing more harm than good by running a server on your computer anyway. i know from personal experience.

Read full topic
